name: Storm Project (Beta test)
description:
Storm Project is a Megaman Zero like. It's a personal project that I want to continue, but I need to find one special feature to stand out.

I'm a programmer, so there's not much art but they'll come !

Here, you can find a prototype of the tutorial.

If you have any suggestions, feed back...., use the comments section, thanks!

(Please full screen)

Controls (only for Xbox controller) :

Move : Joystick 

Jump : A

Dash : LB

Shoot : X

Sword attack : RB

New Features :

It's the first release, so everything!

Next Features :

  • More arts (tuto, boss attacks....)
  • Menu with difficulty selection (+ hard mod boss) 
  • Arts menu ( with different design for the player...)
  • Fix the boss (bug if you're behind him)
